title: InfoWars credibility in the U.S. 2017
summary: The chart shows the InfoWars credibility Response in terms of the Share of respondents with Somewhat_credible having the InfoWars – 43 respondents down to Heard_of_no_opinion the least credibility of the group at 6 respondents .
In between , we have Never_heard_of 43 , Very_credible 6 , Not_too_credible 12 and Not_at_all_credible 12 .
gold: This timeline presents data on the credibility of InfoWars in the United States as of November 2017 . During a survey , six percent of respondents stated that they found the website very credible .
